By WHT Junior on Sunday, November 16, 2003 - 12:20 pm:

Well, I normally don't look at the book, but I did, and found something interesting.

In the back, where they list Special Thanks, they list Lisa (and website) and Fenrick. I just wanted to take this time to thank them for all their help with the game, and their dedication to make the game what it has become. ^_^

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, November 18, 2003 - 11:02 am:

A big, "You're Welcome" to WHT and the others! Fen and I both moderate Tecmo's message boards, a fairly time-consuming task. We also gave input on the MR4 game, and were generally around when Tecmo needed small favors.

By Nephre-nara on Wednesday, November 19, 2003 - 10:15 am:

speaking of Tecmo listening to their players, is there a place to comment to them on opinions of the game? I was thinking with enough positive feedback they'd make another MR game :P (not that I've finished or am tired of this one!)

one thing I was disappointed with is how creating monsters from your cd collection seems to be not as easy as before. You can't get the Monster Breed Name, Main & Sub species, stats, etc right after you create them, before you accept them to take them home now. (as I am sure you have all noticed). I sort of think this is a setback from the other games.

But I think the adventures in MR4 are better than ever! They definitely made adventuring a lot of fun :)

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, November 19, 2003 - 12:17 pm:

By Anonymous on Saturday, March 20, 2004 - 10:53 pm:

By DarkPalidan on Sunday, March 21, 2004 - 04:25 pm:

By Infernus on Sunday, March 21, 2004 - 05:38 pm:

By Lisa Shock on Sunday, March 21, 2004 - 08:43 pm:

I also helped localize MF4 for the US. I played MF4 and turned in bug reports, and general play info for the US office.
